text: Abdulkadir Inan (in center) Abdulkadir Inan (; , Äbdelqadir İnan; 1889 – 1 October 1976, Istanbul) was a Bashkir historian and folklorist. He was the author of over 350 scientific articles. ==Early life== Born Fathelkadir Mustafievich Suleymanov (; , Fätqelqadir Mostafa ulı Söläymänov), his father Mustafa taught in Madrassas. He was a descendant of the Bashkiri national hero Salawat Yulayev. title: Abdulkadir Inan
